SELECT count(1) FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE substr(ACCEPTKEY,0,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AND DIAGST != 'F' AND nvl(appoyn, '') != 'R'
AND DIAGCDNM = #roomNo#
AND UPPER(DOCT) = UPPER(#doctorKey#)
AND DOCT LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND DOCTNM LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND PATNAME LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND DIAGCD LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
WHERE rownum <= #lastRowNum#

SELECT emract.* ,-1 as alert_count FROM ( SELECT emract.ACCEPTKEY ,emract.DIAGCD ,emract.DIAGCDNM ,emract.DOCT ,emract.DOCTNM ,emract.CHARTNO ,emract.PATNAME ,emract.BIRTH ,emract.TELLNO ,emract.APPOYN ,emract.DIAGST ,emract.ODRDAT ,emract.INYN ,emract.AGEE ,emract.SSEXX ,UPPER(emract.DIAGCD)as DEPTCODE ,CASE WHEN DIAGST = 'W' THEN 'C' WHEN APPOYN = 'W' THEN 'R' WHEN APPOYN = 'L' THEN 'R' WHEN CALLYN = 'C' THEN 'T' ELSE 'S' END as STATUS FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE substr(ACCEPTKEY,0,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AND nvl(DIAGST, '') != 'F' AND nvl(appoyn, '') != 'R'
) emract WHERE 1=1
AND ROOM = #roomNo#
AND UPPER(DOCT) = UPPER(#doctorKey#)
AND DOCT LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND DOCTNM LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND PATNAME LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
AND DIAGCD LIKE ('%' || #search_text# || '%')
ORDER BY ACCEPTKEY
WHERE rownum <= #lastRowNum#

SELECT emract.* FROM ( SELECT APPODAT ,PATNAME ,DIAGCDNM ,APPOTM ,APPOROOM ,APPOFLAG ,APPODOCT ,APPODIAGCD FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE APPODAT = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AND APPOROOM is not null AND DIAGST != 'F' AND nvl(appoyn, '') != 'R' ORDER BY ACCEPTKEY ) emract

SELECT UPPER( emract.DOCT)as DEPTCODE ,emract.ACCEPTKEY ,emract.PATNAME ,emract.SSEXX ,emract.ODRDAT ,emract.CHARTNO ,emract.DIAGCD ,emract.DIAGCDNM ,UPPER(emract.DIAGCD)as DEPTCODE ,CASE WHEN DIAGST = 'W' THEN 'C' WHEN APPOYN = 'W' THEN 'R' WHEN APPOYN = 'L' THEN 'R' WHEN CALLYN = 'C' THEN 'T' ELSE 'S' END as STATUS ,COUNT(*)OVER(PARTITION BY emract.DIAGCD) as alert_count FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE substr(ACCEPTKEY,0,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') AND nvl(DIAGST, '') != 'F' 7

SELECT *
,-1 as alert_count FROM VW_ACCEPT emract WHERE ACCEPTKEY = #acceptKey#
